name: MentalMath Time Trial
description:
Answer as many questions as you can in 20 seconds!

Test your mental maths skills to the absolute limits and answer simple questions as quickly as you can. It's not as easy as you think, though..!
Use your keyboard to type in a number, and press Enter to submit it. If you make a mistake, simply press Backspace!

Features:
  • 3 different tests
  • Randomly-generated questions
  • there really isnt anything else this is just a basic generic maths game

I made this in 2 days as a school project, please dont expect anything
maybe ill update it ;)
